info.title: Open Politica - Congreso - API
info.description: API para proyecto Congreso desarrollado para backend de Open Politica in Node.JS

get.summary: Returns information about congresspeople. If a query parameter is not defined, returns the complete list of congresspeople. Otherwise return the information about a specific congressperson. Accepts 'cv_id' and 'id_dni' as parameters, but in case are both provided, the cv_id takes precedence.

parameters.name: cv_id
parameters.description: Identificator of a specific congressperson through the cv_id value

parameters.name: id_dni
parameters.description: Identificator of a specific congressperson through the id_dni value

get.summary: Returns information about a specific congressperson using the slug value as the identificator.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: URL-friendly name identificator of a specific congressperson.

get.summary: Returns information about parliamentary groups. If a query parameter is not defined, returns the complete list of parliamentary groups. Otherwise return the information about a specific parliamentary group. Accepts 'slug' and 'parliamentary_group_name' as parameters, but in case are both provided, the slug takes precedence.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: ID of a specific parliamentary group through the slug value

parameters.name: parliamentary_group_name
parameters.description: Name of a specific parliamentary group through the parliamentary_group_name value

get.summary: Returns information about a specific parliamentary group using the slug value as the identificator.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: URL-friendly name identificator of a specific parliamentary group.
